name: SimonMightKnow
0:
”Alexa, launch Simon Might Know”
”ask Simon Why is the sky blue”
”ask What do pickles get all wrinkly”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simon might know
des: Simon uses the power of Large Language Models, specifically Chat GPT, to answer, or try to answer, any question you might have. Just launch Simon Might Know, and then say, 'Ask Simon' followed by your question.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
